tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE contact_details (
    contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE contact_details (
  contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(255),
  last_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_id UUID,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_id INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_type VARCHAR(50),
    log_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE donations (
    donation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    donor_id INT,
    donation_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    donation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (donor_id) REFERENCES donors(donor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contact_details (
  contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
  communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_id UUID,
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  communication_type TEXT,
  communication_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE donors (
  donor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_name TEXT,
  donor_email TEXT,
  donor_phone TEXT,
  total_donation DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE donations (
  donation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  donor_id UUID,
  donation_date TIMESTAMP,
  donation_amount DECIMAL,
  donation_method TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name TEXT,
  event_date TIMESTAMP,
  event_location TEXT,
  event_description TEXT
)
